summary: Diff indicates PricingSection UI text for the (second) “Popular/Professional” plan’s Minimum Investment was updated to “$51 - $200”, but the diff summary does not provide enough concrete evidence to verify the change was applied ONLY to the single DOM element specified by the exact XPath and that no other text elements were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update ONLY the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[5]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2 so that its displayed text matches exactly: "$51 - $200".
missing_requirements.reason: While the summary states the second pricing card now displays "$51 - $200" for Minimum Investment, the provided truncated code and file summaries do not show the exact DOM structure / XPath target, so it cannot be confirmed that ONLY the specified element was changed and that no other text elements outside that XPath were modified.
